name: Mighty Lube® Type CCL
description: Mighty Lube® Type CCL Lubricant is a specially designed thin film, anti-wear penetrating lubricant. Type CCL uses a penetrating solvent / cleaner, with an attractive light citrus aroma. Specially formulated for the coating industry, Type CCL uses synthetic ester based fluids that provide a semi-wet, thin film lubricant which will work at temperatures up to 575°F. Type CCL lubricant will break down other inferior lubricants or carbons and help clean the conveyor.
